scripts.build: npm install && cd client && rm -f yarn.lock && rm -rf node_modules && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npx browserslist@latest --update-db && npm run build:legacy
scripts.render-build: npm install && cd client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build:legacy && echo 'Checking build output...' && ls -la client/ && ls -la client/build/ || echo 'Build directory not found'
scripts.audit-fix: npm audit fix && cd client && npm audit fix
